metadata.title: Arctic Sea Ice 1901-1956
metadata.description: Phase One of a University of East Anglia Climatic Research Unit study of "The Potential for Arctic Sea-Ice Prediction on Climatic Time Scales" has produced a digital circumpolar ice limit for the years 1901 -1956. Data source is the ice charts produced by the Danish Meteorological Institute from ship, shore, and aerial observations. Data are displayed in a standard one-degree grid. Data reliability assessment was planned as phase two, but this phase has never been funded.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To create a data source for  ice charts produced by the Danish Meteorological Institute from ship, shore, and aerial observations.

Status: In Progress
